title: HOMFLY parabolic restriction, defect skein theory and the Turaev coproduct
summary: We define a HOMFLY version of the category $\text{Rep}_q\text{P}$ of quantum representations of a parabolic subgroup $\text{P}\subseteq\text{GL}_{m+n}$ of block triangular matrices. Alongside this category, we construct functors that interpolate the usual restriction functors between $\text{GL}_{m+n}$, $\text{P}$ and the subgroup $\text{L}\subseteq\text{GL}_{m+n}$ of block-diagonal matrices, yielding a universal version of the formalism of parabolic restriction. Based on this formalism, we construct central algebras and centred bimodules which serve as algebraic ingredients for defining a skein theory on $3$-manifolds with surface and line defects. We recover the Turaev coproduct on the HOMFLY skein algebra as a particular instance of this theory. In particular, this coproduct is compatible with the cutting and gluing of surfaces.

AI.tldr: 本文构建了量子表示范畴的HOMFLY版本，建立了抛物线限制的泛函形式，并基于此构造了中心代数和中心双模，用于定义带缺陷的3-流形上的skein理论。
AI.motivation: 研究量子群表示范畴的HOMFLY推广，建立抛物线限制的泛函形式，为带表面和线缺陷的3-流形上的skein理论提供代数基础。
AI.method: 定义了抛物线子群量子表示范畴的HOMFLY版本，构造了插值限制函子，建立了抛物线限制的泛函形式，并基于此构造了中心代数和中心双模。
AI.result: 成功构建了HOMFLY版本的量子表示范畴和相应的函子理论，建立了带缺陷3-流形skein理论的代数框架，并恢复了Turaev余积作为该理论的特例。
AI.conclusion: 该工作为带缺陷拓扑流形的skein理论提供了系统的代数基础，将Turaev余积纳入统一框架，并证明了其与曲面切割粘合的兼容性。

title: Point-set models for homotopy coherent coalgebras
summary: We show a first rectification result for homotopy chain coalgebras over a field. On the one hand, we consider the $\infty$-category obtained by localizing differential graded coalgebras over an operad with respect to quasi-isomorphisms; on the other, we give a general definition of an $\infty$-category of coalgebras over an enriched $\infty$-operad. We show by induction over cell attachments that these two $\infty$-categories are in fact equivalent when the operad is cofibrant. This yields explicit point-set models for $E_n$-coalgebras and $E_\infty$-coalgebras in the derived $\infty$-category of chain complexes over a field, and an explicit point-set model for the cellular chains functor with its $E_\infty$-coalgebra structure. After Bachmann--Burklund, this gives a point-set algebraic model for nilpotent $p$-adic homotopy types.

AI.tldr: 本文证明了同伦链余代数在域上的第一个矫正结果，建立了微分分级余代数与富化∞-操作数余代数∞-范畴的等价性，为E_n和E_∞余代数提供了显式点集模型。
AI.motivation: 为同伦链余代数建立第一个矫正结果，为E_n和E_∞余代数在链复形派生∞-范畴中提供显式点集模型，并为nilpotent p-adic同伦类型提供点集代数模型。
AI.method: 通过局部化微分分级余代数得到∞-范畴，同时定义富化∞-操作数余代数的∞-范畴，通过细胞附着的归纳证明这两个∞-范畴在操作数为cofibrant时等价。
AI.result: 证明了两个∞-范畴的等价性，为E_n和E_∞余代数提供了显式点集模型，为细胞链函子提供了E_∞余代数结构的显式点集模型，并为nilpotent p-adic同伦类型提供了点集代数模型。
AI.conclusion: 本文建立了同伦链余代数的矫正理论，为高阶代数结构提供了具体的点集模型，连接了同伦理论与代数表示，具有重要的理论意义和应用价值。

title: Quantum isometry groups of log-Laplacians on Cuntz--Krieger algebras
summary: We compute the quantum isometry groups of Cuntz--Krieger algebras endowed with the spectral triples coming from the Ahlfors regular structure of the underlying topological Markov chain. This allows us to exhibit a new family of compact quantum groups, mixing features from quantum automorphism groups of graphs and easy quantum groups. Contrary to the classical isometry groups, whose actions on the Cuntz--Krieger algebras are never ergodic, the quantum isometry group acts ergodically in the case of the Cuntz algebra. This also leads to the construction of a (genuinely quantum) ergodic and faithful action of a compact matrix quantum group on the Cantor space.

AI.tldr: 计算Cuntz-Krieger代数的量子等距群，这些代数配备了来自拓扑马尔可夫链Ahlfors正则结构的光谱三元组，发现了混合图量子自同构群和简单量子群特征的新量子群族。
AI.motivation: 研究Cuntz-Krieger代数在特定光谱三元组下的量子等距群，探索量子群理论在非交换几何中的新应用，特别是量子等距群与经典等距群在遍历性方面的差异。
AI.method: 使用来自拓扑马尔可夫链Ahlfors正则结构的光谱三元组，计算Cuntz-Krieger代数的量子等距群，将量子自同构群和简单量子群的特征相结合。
AI.result: 发现了一个新的紧致量子群族，混合了图量子自同构群和简单量子群的特征；与经典等距群不同，量子等距群在Cuntz代数情况下具有遍历作用；构造了紧致矩阵量子群在康托空间上的真正量子遍历忠实作用。
AI.conclusion: 量子等距群为研究Cuntz-Krieger代数提供了新视角，展示了量子群在非交换几何中的丰富结构，特别是在遍历性方面超越了经典对应物，为量子群作用理论开辟了新方向。

title: Quantization of bounded symplectic domains associated with compact Lie groups
summary: We present a systematic quantization scheme for bounded symplectic domains of the form $D \times G \subset T^\ast G$, where $D \subset \mathfrak{g}^\ast$ is a bounded region defined by algebraic inequalities and $G$ is a compact Lie group with Lie algebra $\mathfrak{g}$. The finiteness of the symplectic volume implies that quantization yields a finite-dimensional Hilbert space, with observables represented by Hermitian matrices, for which we provide an explicit realization. Boundary effects necessitate modifications of the standard von Neumann and Dirac conditions, which usually underlie the correspondence principle. Physically, the compact group $G$ plays the role of momentum space, while $\mathfrak{g}^\ast$ corresponds to the (noncommutative) position space of a particle. The assumption of compact momentum space has profound physical consequences, including the supertunneling phenomenon and the emergence of a maximal fermion density.

AI.tldr: 该论文提出了有界辛域D×G⊂T*G的系统量子化方案，其中D是代数不等式定义的有界区域，G是紧致李群。由于辛体积有限，量子化产生有限维希尔伯特空间，可观测量由厄米矩阵表示。边界效应需要修改标准的冯·诺依曼和狄拉克条件，紧致动量空间导致超隧穿现象和最大费米子密度等物理后果。
AI.motivation: 研究有界辛域的量子化问题，特别是当动量空间为紧致李群时的物理系统。传统量子化方法在有边界的情况下需要修改，且紧致动量空间会产生独特的物理现象。
AI.method: 提出系统量子化方案：1）考虑有界辛域D×G，其中D⊂g*由代数不等式定义，G是紧致李群；2）利用有限辛体积得到有限维希尔伯特空间；3）为可观测量提供显式的厄米矩阵表示；4）修改标准的冯·诺依曼和狄拉克条件以处理边界效应。
AI.result: 成功实现了有界辛域的量子化，得到了有限维希尔伯特空间和可观测量矩阵表示。发现紧致动量空间导致超隧穿现象和最大费米子密度等独特物理效应。
AI.conclusion: 该量子化方案为有界辛域提供了系统框架，揭示了紧致动量空间的深刻物理含义，包括边界效应的重要性和由此产生的特殊物理现象。

title: Maximal transitivity of the cactus group on standard Young tableaux
summary: The action of the cactus group $C_n$ on Young tableaux of a given shape $λ$ goes back to Berenstein and Kirillov and arises naturally in the study of crystal bases and quantum integrable systems. We show that this action is $2$-transitive on standard Young tableaux of the shape $λ$ if and only if $λ$ is not self-transpose and not a single hook. Moreover, we show that in these cases, the image of the cactus group in the permutation group of standard Young tableaux is either the whole permutation group or the alternating group, and prove that both cases are possible for infinitely many $λ$ (though the alternating group is more frequent). As an application, this implies that the Galois group of solutions to the Bethe ansatz in the Gaudin model attached to the Lie group $GL_d$ is, in many cases, at least the alternating group. This also extends the results of Sottile and White on the multiple transitivity of the Galois group of Schubert calculus problems in Grassmannians to many new cases.

AI.tldr: 本文研究了仙人掌群C_n在给定形状λ的杨表上的作用，证明了该作用在标准杨表上是2-传递的当且仅当λ不是自转置且不是单钩形。此外，证明了在这些情况下，仙人掌群在标准杨表置换群中的像要么是整个置换群，要么是交错群。
AI.motivation: 研究仙人掌群C_n在杨表上的作用，这一作用源于Berenstein和Kirillov的工作，并自然出现在晶体基和量子可积系统的研究中。作者旨在刻画该作用的传递性特征及其在置换群中的像。
AI.method: 通过组合数学和群论方法，分析仙人掌群在标准杨表上的作用。研究该作用的传递性条件，并确定仙人掌群在置换群中的像（整个置换群或交错群）。
AI.result: 证明了仙人掌群作用在标准杨表上是2-传递的当且仅当杨图形状λ不是自转置且不是单钩形。在这些情况下，仙人掌群在标准杨表置换群中的像要么是整个置换群，要么是交错群，且两种情况都有无穷多个λ的例子，但交错群情况更常见。
AI.conclusion: 该结果具有多重应用：1）意味着GL_d李群对应的Gaudin模型中Bethe ansatz解的伽罗瓦群在许多情况下至少是交错群；2）将Sottile和White关于格拉斯曼流形中Schubert计算问题伽罗瓦群多重传递性的结果推广到许多新情况。

title: An $\mathfrak{sl}_2$ action on link homology of T(2,k) torus links
comment: 22 pages. Section 6 completely rewritten. Accepted version to appear in Journal of Knot Theory and Its Ramifications
summary: We determine an $\mathfrak{sl}_2$ module structure on the equivariant Khovanov-Rozansky homology of (2,k)-torus links following the framework defined in arXiv:2306.10729.

AI.tldr: 该论文确定了(2,k)-环面链环的等变Khovanov-Rozansky同调上的𝔰𝔩₂模结构
AI.motivation: 研究(2,k)-环面链环的等变Khovanov-Rozansky同调，探索其代数结构，特别是𝔰𝔩₂模结构
AI.method: 采用arXiv:2306.10729中定义的框架，分析(2,k)-环面链环的等变Khovanov-Rozansky同调
AI.result: 成功确定了(2,k)-环面链环的等变Khovanov-Rozansky同调上的𝔰𝔩₂模结构
AI.conclusion: 该研究为理解环面链环的等变Khovanov-Rozansky同调的代数结构提供了新的见解
